titleStmt.title: Death's uncontrollable summons; or, The mortality of mankind. Being a dialogue between death and a young-man. To the tune of, My bleeding heart.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Pye-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "In slumber and sleep my senses fail'd ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
